Uses of Interface
com.github.tadukoo.util.view.gradient.Gradient

Packages that use Gradient 
Package Description
com.github.tadukoo.util.lookandfeel.paintui
Contains PaintUIResource and its implementations to allow for customizing the Paints to be used in TadukooLookAndFeel within the TadukooTheme.
com.github.tadukoo.util.view.gradient
Provides builders for making Gradients that can be used to span an arbitrary space (has a method to generate a Paint when given a Dimension, rather than making a gradient paint that only works for certain dimensions.

  • Uses of Gradient in com.github.tadukoo.util.lookandfeel.paintui

    Classes in com.github.tadukoo.util.lookandfeel.paintui that implement Gradient 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  GradientUIResource
    GradientUIResource is simply a LinearGradient wrapped as a PaintUIResource so that it can be used in TadukooLookAndFeel by putting it in a TadukooTheme.
    Fields in com.github.tadukoo.util.lookandfeel.paintui declared as Gradient 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Gradient GradientUIResource.gradient
    The Gradient contained in this Gradient UI resource
    Constructors in com.github.tadukoo.util.lookandfeel.paintui with parameters of type Gradient 
    Constructor Description
    GradientUIResource​(Gradient gradient)
    Constructs a Gradient UI Resource using the given Gradient.

  • Uses of Gradient in com.github.tadukoo.util.view.gradient

    Classes in com.github.tadukoo.util.view.gradient that implement Gradient 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  LinearGradient
    Linear Gradient is used to build a Gradient object to use for LinearGradientPaint.
    class  RadialGradient
    Linear Gradient is used to build a Gradient object to use for RadialGradientPaint.
    Methods in com.github.tadukoo.util.view.gradient that return Gradient 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Gradient GradientBuilder.build()
    Builds the Gradient after checking for errors.
    protected abstract Gradient GradientBuilder.buildGradient()
    Builds the actual Gradient.
    protected Gradient RadialGradient.RadialGradientBuilder.buildGradient()
    Builds the actual Gradient.
